title: The best messaging app period
text: Its free and easy to use. Your not required to pay to use basic functions like stickers, which your forced to do with Discord. Highly customizable UI! Syncs great between mobile and desktop apps. Also great since the company does not censor speech or goes along with the government wants.

title: App support review
text: It seems that at this stage in my life, anything to do with a computer, laptop, cell phone can be difficult and confusing. I got through it after several mistakes but considering the facts that‚Äôs pretty darn good thank you.

title: Good app but iPad needs work.
text: App works great on iPhone but the iPad app needs more testing. The keyboard does not function properly, it‚Äôs a hassle to input codes or text. Dismissing the keyboard in landscape mode breaks the UI and it constantly detects the login from Shenghai, China. (It‚Äôs certainly not!) Even though I know this is me logging in, it still is rather concerning. It could be more optimized.

title: Normally everything‚Äôs fine but here lately‚Ä¶
text: When I click on somebody‚Äôs name it delays before it opens it delays before it gives me a keyboard to type and it suddenly not letting me know when people are messaging me and somebody else message me at 10 in the morning but I‚Äôm not getting it until 4 PM this has been going on for about three weeks before that I had zero problems looking for a little bit of an update on if there‚Äôs gonna be bug fixes for stuff like this, I was going to uninstall and reinstall I was gonna lose all my data if I did that so I don‚Äôt wanna do that, the conversation data needs to stay so there needs to be a fail safe that we have to uninstall the program and reinstall that it doesn‚Äôt delete our data other programs tell you when you‚Äôre deleting that all your data will be saved. I do like Telegram a lot, and depend on it a lot but it‚Äôs acting up severely. Thank you.

title: Some small suggestions and feedback on telegram
text:
Hello, I am a user from China.

Recently, I found that a large number of mobile phone numbers in China (+86) cannot receive verification codes! Friends around me generally encounter this problem. I hope the official can have a corresponding solution to solve it. This is very important to us, thank you very muchüôè

Under the unpredictable circumstances of the world environment, people's privacy and security are becoming more and more vulnerable to infringement. Accordingly, people are also paying more and more attention to privacy and information security!

Mobile phone number login is easy to find, so this is not a very skilful method (this is not in line with our original intention of establishing Telegram).

I sincerely suggest that you can add several more ways to log in! For example: Google account login, apple login, email account login! The change of login method allows more friends to join in and build a harmonious and healthy platform for making friends and sharing love.

If you can adopt it, or give a reply, thank you very muchüôè

Looking forward to your replyüôè
